org.ietf.nea.pt.socket

Class SocketTransportConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.SocketTransportConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransportConnection

    public class SocketTransportConnection
extends Object
implements TransportConnection
    Transport connection with an underlying Socket.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  SocketTransportConnection.TransportPhase
      Runnable which handles the transport phase with a remote peer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SocketTransportConnection

        public SocketTransportConnection(boolean selfInitiated,
                         boolean server,
                         Socket socket,
                         TransportAttributes attributes,
                         TransportWriter<TransportMessage> writer,
                         TransportReader<TransportMessageContainer> reader,
                         ExecutorService runner)
        Creates a SocketTransportConnection with corresponding transport attributes and serializer.
        Parameters:
        selfInitiated - true if connection was initiated by this side and false if not
        server - true if this is the server and false if not
        socket - the underlying socket
        attributes - the transport connection attributes
        writer - the protocol reader
        reader - the protocol writer
        runner - the connection thread executor

        Description copied from interface: TransportConnection
        Checks if the connection is open.
        Specified by:
        isOpen in interface TransportConnection
        Returns:
        true if connection is open and data can be written/read, false if connection is closed.

        Throws:

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: TransportConnection
        Closes the connection. No further data can be send. Connection cannot be reopened.
        Specified by:
        close in interface TransportConnection

      • getIdentifier

        private long getIdentifier()
        Returns a linear growing identifier for a transport message. If the identifier reaches a value >= 4294967295 it restarts at zero.
        Returns:
        the growing identifier

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
                 throws SerializationException,
                        ValidationException,
                        ConnectionException
        Initializes the transport connection by going thru the following phases.
        • negotiation phase
        • authentication phase (optional)
        • transport phase (final)
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if an error occurred at message serialization
        ValidationException - if an error occurred at message parsing
        ConnectionException - if the connection is broken

      • negotiateVersion

        private void negotiateVersion()
                       throws SerializationException,
                              ValidationException,
                              ConnectionException
        Handles the transport protocol version negotiation phase with a remote peer.
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if an error occurred at message serialization
        ValidationException - if an error occurred at message parsing
        ConnectionException - if the connection is broken

      • createValidationErrorMessage

        private TransportMessage createValidationErrorMessage(ValidationException exception)
                                               throws ValidationException
        Creates a transport message containing a validation exception.
        Parameters:
        exception - the validation exception
        Returns:
        the transport message
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if message creation fails

      • makeAuthentication

        private void makeAuthentication()
                         throws ValidationException,
                                ConnectionException,
                                SerializationException
        Handles the authentication phase with a remote peer. This implementation does not support additional authentication. If the remote peer requests additional authentication, a transport message containing an error is send.
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if an error occurred at message serialization
        ValidationException - if an error occurred at message parsing
        ConnectionException - if the connection is broken

      • writeToStream

        private void writeToStream(TransportMessage message)
                    throws ConnectionException,
                           SerializationException
        Write a transport message to an output stream using a writer for serialization.
        Parameters:
        message - the transport message
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if an error occurred at message serialization
        ConnectionException - if the connection is broken

      • readFromStream

        private TransportMessageContainer readFromStream()
                                          throws SerializationException,
                                                 ValidationException,
                                                 ConnectionException
        Reads a transport message from an input stream using a reader for parsing.
        Returns:
        the container containing a transport message and minor parsing exceptions if any
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if an error occurred at message serialization
        ValidationException - if an error occurred at message parsing
        ConnectionException - if the connection is broken

      • checkMessageLength

        private void checkMessageLength(long length)
                         throws SerializationException
        Checks the message length according to the maximum full message length attribute.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the current message
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if message is to large

      • checkRoundTrips

        private void checkRoundTrips()
        Checks the round trip counter if the maximum round trips are exceeded.
